translations.features-why_WhydonateIsBestHomeBoth: WhyDonate Is The Best Fundraising Platform
translations.features-why_whydonateNoSubscriptionCost: WhyDonate charges 0% platform costs and no subscription costs. There are only standard costs for payment processing of Credit cards, PayPal, iDeal, Bancontact etc.
translations.features-why_customerSupportAlwaysHome: Facing a problem? Our customer support team is ready to help.
translations.features-why_pagesOptimizedHome: The pages are optimized to provide an optimum look on all devices, such as desktop, tablet or mobile.
translations.features_why_comprehensiveDashboardHome: The comprehensive dashboard provides a one-stop view of all your fundraisers, donor and payout data.
translations.features_why_additionToYourNetworkHome: In addition to your own network, reach 500,000+ donors and 100,000+ visitors a month on WhyDonate.
translations.features_why_createAndStartOnlineHome: Create an account and start online fundraising within minutes.
translations.features_why_requestImmediatePayoutHome: Request an immediate payout of the donations, or wait for the automated monthly payout. WhyDonate pays out donations to all European SEPA countries.
translations.feadture_why_addOwnCustomBrandingHome: Add your own custom branding and content to fundraisers, donation forms and emails.
translations.features_why_donationsAndDataSecureHome: WhyDonate makes sure your donations and data are secure. The data is stored encrypted, and all payments are secured by licensed payment institutions.
translations.sub_footer_start_fundraiser_whydonateOnl: WhyDonate makes online fundraising easy and accessible for charities and individuals all over the world. 0% platform fee, so let’s start.
translations.digital_collection_box_contactLessDonati: The WhyDonate contactless PIN donation box enables on-the-go charity fundraising. Tab the device with a debit or credit card to make a donation.
translations.donation_plugin_raiseMoneyForCharityHome: Raise money for charity by adding the donation plugin to your website. Create the best donation site for charity. Free installation within a couple of minutes.
translations.online_fundraising_features_multiLangSup: Multi-language support, national and international payment methods and payouts to all European (EEA) countries.
translations.online_fundraising_features_onlineFundra: Online fundraising, including peer-to-peer or team fundraisers.
translations.online_fundraising_features_acceptRecurr: Accept recurring (monthly and annual) donations. WhyDonate handles the recurring payment with the donor and the payout into your bank account.
translations.online_fundraising_features_replaceWhydo: Replace WhyDonate's branding by simply adding the colours, font and logo of your organization.
translations.organisation_banner_whydonateBestCrowdFu: WhyDonate is the best fundraising site for charity. Raise money and achieve your charity goals.

translations.fundraising_site_moreServicesWithWhydona: On WhyDonate you can start a personal fundraising campaign, a fundraiser for a charity or a peer-to-peer fundraiser.

translations.bank_accountType_info:
Business account verification requires extra documentation. You will need to provide:
- Copy Bank Account Statement.
- UBO's (Ultimate Beneficial Owners) details.
- Identification of legal representative.

Be sure to select the correct account type because you won't be able to change it afterwards.
